m_szDocTitle: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Hits Five-Month High After Deutsche Upgrade - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock Hits Five-Month High After Deutsche Upgrade By Andrew Meola | 08/11/14 - 04:16 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) hit a five-month high of $263.74 on Monday after Deutsche upgraded the electric car maker to "buy" and set a $310 price target, up from $220. The firm believes Elon Musk's company can deliver steeper growth. “Tesla suggested that their growth trajectory will be much steeper, their mix will be much richer and their costs will ultimately be much lower than we previously assumed,” Deutsche wrote in a research note.
